description.value:
Trigger You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Rage].

You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your anger. Each enemy within 20 feet takes @Damage[(@actor.level)]{damage equal to your level} (@Check[fortitude|against:barbarian|basic] save against your class DC) of the same type as your additional damage during that Rage.

value.value: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
